fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform an Investigator (35) check on a player.
- (Rehearsal) Poison a player if they are an enemy that is non-good, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Learn the true role of a player. Twice per game, after learning their role, you may choose to attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You do not notify your targets that they were investigated.
- **Rehearsal Radius:** 2
